author: Simon Difford
description: Pisco, pineapple and Sauvignon Blanc wine are a match made in heaven, while gentian liqueur provides complex underlying gentian bittersweet notes.
name: Suzie Cocktail
recipeIngredient: 10 ml Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)
10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
